item.title: Choregraphe Software for Pepper Robot
item.description: The purpose of this post is to build up a robot speaking system with body language and speech text and speech sound in Choregraphe. See the documentation here or download the software here. The process is very straight forward using this software. Step-1: Firstly we opened Choregraphe App and connected to the virtual robot ‘NAO H21​’. After that, we selected the ‘Say’ node, ​’Delay’ node and ‘Play Sound’ ​node on the Box library.
